description: Write a function that validates a URL. It must return 1 if the URL's hostname part is a domain name (not a literal IP address). Example (Domain): is_url_hostname_not_ip("http://example.com") -> 1. Example (IP): is_url_hostname_not_ip("http://1.2.3.4") -> 0. Example (Malformed): is_url_hostname_not_ip("bad-url") -> 0.
